snippet: In the fall, Hatch, N.M., is filled with the smoky aroma of roasting chiles.
abstract: Abe Streep article describes stocking up on chiles from Hatch, NM, which bills itself as Chile Capital of the World, before moving to New York City.
lead_paragraph: In the fall, Hatch, N.M., is filled with the smoky aroma of roasting chiles.

headline.main: The Chile Capital of the World
headline.print_headline: The Chile Capital of the World
